channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @onthemainline One Seder I offered four explanations for the orange on our plate. One was a Zionist reference to Jaffa oranges. One was this historically accurate explanation. One drew on Tu b’shvat klipa ideas. Can’t remember the fourth at the moment. Maybe a glass of wine would help…
@byJudeDoyle Data point: There was an antisemitic attack on a local doctor’s office in my very Jewish town not long ago seemingly motivated by these conspiracy theories. https://t.co/JeRPmpfFkT
@brianbeutler @joshtpm And the Dems are wired for the DC press as it existed when they were high school nerds back in thr 70s.
